sentences.en: A topic-based approach can be hard to assess in primary schools with a typical spread of ability.
sentences.cn: 因为学生的能力通常差异很大，基于话题的教学方法在小学里评估起来可能很难。

sentences.en: Ask them to send you information on how to assess the value of your belongings.
sentences.cn: 让他们把怎样评估你的财产价值的资料寄来。

sentences.en: Drilling will continue on the site to assess the dimensions of the new oilfield.
sentences.cn: 该处的钻探工作将继续下去，以便估测新油田的面积。

sentences.en: It is difficult to assess the full extent of the damage.
sentences.cn: 损失情况难以全面估计。

sentences.en: It is impossible to assess the importance of a machine of this sort, for many international misunderstandings are caused simply through our failure to understand each other.
sentences.cn: 要估计出这种机器的重要性是不可能的, 因为许多国际间的误解纯粹是由于相互不能了解而导致的.

sentences.en: It was for the police to assess the validity or otherwise of the evidence.
sentences.cn: 应该由警方来判定证据有效与否。

sentences.en: It's difficult to assess the effects of these changes.
sentences.cn: 这些变化带来的效果难以评估。

sentences.en: It's impossible to assess how many officers are participating in the slowdown.
sentences.cn: 要估算出究竟多少高级职员参与了怠工是不可能的。

sentences.en: Officials arrived to assess whether it is safe to bring emergency food supplies into the city.
sentences.cn: 官员们赶来评估向该市调拨紧急救援食品是否安全。

sentences.en: She suggests you first assess your income and outgoings.
sentences.cn: 她建议你先估算一下自己的收入和开销。

sentences.en: The college has few ways to assess the quality of education overall.
sentences.cn: 总体看来,这所大学评估教育质量的方法寥寥无几.

sentences.en: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement.
sentences.cn: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

sentences.en: The value of the business was assessed at £1.25 million.
They assess his house at 15000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 他们给他房子的估价为15000元.

sentences.en: We know some sex offenders dupe the psychologists who assess them.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有些性犯罪者会愚弄给他们做测评的心理学家。

sentences.en: We should equitably assess historical figures.
sentences.cn: 我们应该公正地评价历史人物.

sentences.en: We tried to assess his suitability for the job.
sentences.cn: 我们想评估一下他是否适合这项工作.
